def_cn: (结果、事件、局势)轰动性的，引起哗然的
def_en: A sensational result, event, or situation is so remarkable that it causes great excitement and interest.

def_cn: (故事、报道)耸人听闻的，哗众取宠的
def_en: You can describe stories or reports as sensational if you disapprove of them because they present facts in a way that is intended to cause feelings of shock, anger, or excitement.
You can describe something as sensational when you think that it is extremely good.
